en.name: Only Silence Remains
en.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by {{16//20//24//28//32%}}. If there are 2 or fewer enemies on the field, increases wearer's CRIT Rate by {{12//15//18//21//24%}}.

zh.name: 唯有沉默
zh.description: 使装备者的攻击力提高{{16//20//24//28//32%}}。当场上的敌方目标数量小于等于2时，装备者的暴击率提高{{12//15//18//21//24%}}。
